title: Омут
overview: Psychologist Evgeniya, who leaves her former life in the metropolis with her family and returns to her hometown, because the local healing climate is ideal for the health of her teenage daughter. Zhenya's husband believes that here, far from everyone, they will finally be happy. However, in her native land, the heroine unexpectedly meets Artyom, her first love, and feelings flare up with a new force that they cannot resist. But neither Artyom's wife nor Zhenya's husband intend to let them go so easily.
